name: Basic Property Inquiry Template
content:
Dear {{first_name}},

My name is [Your Name] and I'm interested in your property at {{property_address}}.

I noticed your property and wanted to reach out to see if you might be interested in discussing potential options for it.

Please feel free to contact me at [Your Phone Number] or [Your Email] if you'd like to discuss further.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
[Your Company]
